originalText.text: I have to say, I tried working with other companies, the professionalism here was second to none in comparison . I have a high end  clientele and Sean and Jenn and all the crew they sent were beyond helpful and supportive. They are very hands on in terms of managing the crew. They are extremely knowledge, (more than most) professional and they have a fabulous showroom which I was able to use with my client! They went out of their way and I wouldn’t trust anyone else after my  experience with them. You just can’t go wrong with them!

originalText.text: If you're looking for a responsive company that calls back when promised then this company is not the one. If our looking for a company that accommodate you when you need and not when they need then this is not the right company. It's 2020 not 1980, professional businesses know how to handle today's customers expectations and needs and NY Flooring is not one of them. Never used them only had a few conversations and when they say they will call back in 15 minutes to confirm a time that turns into 4 hours later and 2 calls to even get that lat return call. Would never use and suggest people look elsewhere.

originalText.text: Use them every time... for the past 17 years. As a GC doing high end work, I cannot recommend them enough. They are professional, the most knowledgeable I’ve encountered  and the  crew are courteous, professional and doing outstanding work and site protection. Highly recommend them.

originalText.text: We’ve experienced NY Flooring as unprofessional and unaccountable; blaming others for their mistakes. They did a subpar job refinishing our floors, as well as breaking a track on a newly built closet, then denied all responsibility. We would not recommend them based on their shoddy work, and lack of professionalism.
